snippet.title: Guns of Fort Defiance (1981) – Classic Strategy Game
snippet.description:
📌 Title: Guns of Fort Defiance - Video Game 1981

📖 Description:
Guns of Fort Defiance (1981) is a strategy-based war game where players take command of a 19th-century frontier fort, defending it against enemy attacks. Released for early computer systems, it features turn-based tactics, resource management, and artillery defense. Players must carefully allocate ammunition, fortify defenses, and make strategic decisions to ensure victory. A hidden gem for fans of classic war games and tactical challenges.

🎮 Developer: Strategic Simulations, Inc. (SSI)
🕹️ Platform(s): Apple II, Atari 8-bit, Commodore 64
🏆 Genre: Strategy, Turn-Based
